languages.text: Извращенная силами Архиврага нечестивая тварь, что некогда была местным аристократом и сгубила тысячи жизней, пала от руки Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: Извращенная силами Архиврага нечестивая тварь, что некогда была местным аристократом и сгубила тысячи жизней, пала от руки Лорд-капитана.

languages.text: The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.
languages.original_text: Извращенная силами Архиврага нечестивая тварь, что некогда была местным аристократом и сгубила тысячи жизней, пала от руки Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.
The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.
The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.
The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.

languages.text: L'abomination impie responsable de milliers de terribles morts était autrefois un aristocrate local qui s'est laissé corrompre par le Grand Ennemi. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a veillé à mettre fin à son règne de terreur.
languages.original_text: The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.

traits.locale_text: L'abomination impie responsable de milliers de terribles morts était autrefois un aristocrate local qui s'est laissé corrompre par le Grand Ennemi. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a veillé à mettre fin à son règne de terreur.

languages.text: 这只邪恶的怪物曾是当地的贵族，后来遭到了混沌大敌的扭曲，杀害了成千上万的帝国臣民。然而，它的恐怖统治已经结束了，行商浪人亲手终结了它。
languages.original_text: The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.

traits.locale_text: 这只邪恶的怪物曾是当地的贵族，后来遭到了混沌大敌的扭曲，杀害了成千上万的帝国臣民。然而，它的恐怖统治已经结束了，行商浪人亲手终结了它。

languages.text: 何千人もの恐ろしい死の原因となった不浄の生みの親は、渾沌の勢力によって異常に歪んでしまった、かつての地元の貴族だった。その恐怖の支配は終わったと、ロード・キャプテンは確信した。
languages.original_text: The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.

traits.locale_text: 何千人もの恐ろしい死の原因となった不浄の生みの親は、渾沌の勢力によって異常に歪んでしまった、かつての地元の貴族だった。その恐怖の支配は終わったと、ロード・キャプテンは確信した。

languages.text: Die unheilige Brut, die Tausende grauenhaft getötet hatte, war ein ehemaliger örtlicher Aristokrat, der vom Erzfeind korrumpiert worden war. Seine Schreckensherrschaft ist nun vorbei, dafür hat der Lord Captain gesorgt.
languages.original_text: The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.

traits.locale_text: Die unheilige Brut, die Tausende grauenhaft getötet hatte, war ein ehemaliger örtlicher Aristokrat, der vom Erzfeind korrumpiert worden war. Seine Schreckensherrschaft ist nun vorbei, dafür hat der Lord Captain gesorgt.

languages.text: El engendro blasfemo responsable de miles de muertes fue en su día un aristócrata local, retorcido por el Archienemigo. Su reino de terror ha terminado, gracias a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.
languages.original_text: The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.

traits.locale_text: El engendro blasfemo responsable de miles de muertes fue en su día un aristócrata local, retorcido por el Archienemigo. Su reino de terror ha terminado, gracias a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: Binlerce korkunç ölüme neden olmuş menfur yaratık, bir zamanlar yerel bir aristokrat imiş ve Şerbaşı tarafından çarpıtılmış. Dehşet hükümdarlığına Lord Kaptan tarafından net bir şekilde son verildi.
languages.original_text: The unholy spawn responsible for thousands of horrible deaths was once a local aristocrat who had become twisted by the Archenemy. Its reign of terror is over — the Lord Captain made sure of that.
